mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, username, password, age, nick_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
